verses.verse: A Psalm for <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> and thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>
He shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and thy <S%H6041>poor<s%> with <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the little <S%H1389>hills,<s%> by <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

He shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he shall <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H34>needy,<s%> and shall break in <S%H1792>pieces<s%> the <S%H6231>oppressor.<s%>
They shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee as <S%H5973>long<s%> as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H6440>endure,<s%> throughout all <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H1755><s%>
He shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the mown <S%H1488>grass:<s%> as <S%H7241>showers<s%> that <S%H2222>water<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
In his <S%H3117>days<s%> shall the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6524>flourish;<s%> and <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> so <S%H5704>long<s%> as the <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H1097>endureth.<s%>

He shall have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> also from <S%H4480>sea<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and from the <S%H4480>river<s%> <S%H5104><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
They that dwell in the <S%H6728>wilderness<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him; and his <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> and of the <S%H339>isles<s%> shall <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H4503>presents:<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H5434>Seba<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H814>gifts.<s%>
Yea, <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall fall <S%H7812>down<s%> before him: <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him.
For <S%H3588><s%> he shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> when he <S%H7768>crieth;<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> also, and him that hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5826>helper.<s%>
He shall <S%H2347>spare<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> and shall <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of the <S%H34>needy.<s%>

He shall <S%H1350>redeem<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4480>deceit<s%> <S%H8496><s%> and <S%H4480>violence:<s%> <S%H2555><s%> and <S%H3365>precious<s%> shall their <S%H1818>blood<s%> be in his <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

And he shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> and to him shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> of the <S%H4480>gold<s%> <S%H2091><s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba:<s%> <S%H6419>prayer<s%> also shall be made <S%H1157>for<s%> him <S%H8548>continually;<s%> and <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> shall he be <S%H1288>praised.<s%>

There shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H6451>handful<s%> of <S%H1250>corn<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof shall <S%H7493>shake<s%> like <S%H3844>Lebanon:<s%> and they of the <S%H4480>city<s%> <S%H5892><s%> shall <S%H6692>flourish<s%> like <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

His <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H1961>endure<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H5125>continued<s%> as <S%H6440>long<s%> as the <S%H8121>sun:<s%> and men shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> in him: <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall call him <S%H833>blessed.<s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H905>only<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> wondrous <S%H6381>things.<s%>

And <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be his <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> and <S%H853>let<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with his <S%H3519>glory;<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%> and <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
The <S%H8605>prayers<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> are <S%H3615>ended.<s%>
